class_features.Channel Divinity: Invoke your divine power once per encounter and wield special powers
class_features.Healer's Lore: Add your wisdom modifier to the HP gained when you grant healing with one of your cleric abilities
class_features.Healing Word: You can use the Healing Word power
class_features.Ritual Casting: You get the Ritual Caster feat

class_features.Combat Challenge: You can choose to mark the target every time you attack an enemy, regardless if you hit or miss it. Mark lasts until the end of your next turn, and it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that does not include you as the target. And, when the marked target shifts or makes an attack that does not include you, you can make a melee basic attack against the enemy as an immediate interrupt
class_features.Combat Superiority: Bonus to opportunity attacks equal to your Wisdom modifier. When you hit an enemy with it, they stop moving, if a move provoked the attack. I can still move if it has actions left
class_features.Fighter Weapon Talent: +1 to attack rolls with weapons of a chosen style: one handed or two handed.

class_features.Channel Divinity: Invoke your deity once per encounter and wield special powers such as divine mettle and divine strength
class_features.Divine Challenge: Can mark an enemy of your choice with Divine Challenge power

class_features.Arcane Implement Mastery: You specialize in one kind of implement: Orb of Imposition, Staff of Defense, or Wand of Accuracy
class_features.Cantrips: Minor spells you gain at 1st level: Ghost Sound, Light, Mage Hand and Prestidigitation
class_features.Ritual Casting: You gain the Ritual Caster Feat and your book contains three 1st level rituals of your choice
class_features.Spellbook: You begin knowing two daily spells, one Encounter spell and one Utility spell
